headline: CBS to Shake Up Uppermost Ranks As Merger Sinks In
abstract: George Cheeks, recently of NBCUniversal, will take the chief executive job held by Joe Ianniello. Bob Bakish, the head of the new ViacomCBS, now has his team in place.
lead_paragraph: Months after merging with Viacom, CBS announced a significant change in its leadership on Friday.
